sentences.english: Kangkang said that he previewed the day's lesson before class.
sentences.chinese: 康康说他课前预习当天的课程。

sentences.english: On the other hand, students are also required to prepare the lessons.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，学生要加强课前预习。

sentences.english: You should plan to review these slides before coming to class.
sentences.chinese: 来上课前，你必须要先预习投影片内容。

sentences.english: Have you previewed the daily new words?
sentences.chinese: 每天的生词你预习了吗？

sentences.english: Let's preview what we are going to talk about today.
sentences.chinese: 让我们先来预习我们今天要讨论的内容。

sentences.english: Each lab is preceded by a prelab assignment that must be turned in before doing the lab work.
sentences.chinese: 每个实验之前都有预习作业，而且要在实验之前上交。

sentences.english: The teacher's assignment includes previewing Unit 5.
sentences.chinese: 教师的作业包括预习第5单元。

sentences.english: He never fails to review his lessons before class.
sentences.chinese: 课前，他从来没有不预习功课的。

sentences.english: Firstly I will prepare for my lessons before class.
sentences.chinese: 首先，我要在课前做好预习。

sentences.english: Prior to each lesson to learn, give the students a specific arrangement of prep work.
sentences.chinese: 每课书学习之前，给学生布置具体的预习作业。

sentences.english: Before class I prepare new lessons to find out the questions. Then I will listen carefully in class.
sentences.chinese: 课前预习新功课，找出问题，然后在课上认真听。

sentences.english: The students should pre-study the experiment guides.
sentences.chinese: 学生在实验前应认真预习实验指导。

sentences.english: Before class I prepare new lesson to find out the question. Then I will listen carefully in class.
sentences.chinese: 课前预习新功课，找出问题，然后在课上认真听。

sentences.english: Before cla I prepare new leo to find out the questio . Then I will listen carefully in cla .
sentences.chinese: 课前预习新功课，找出问题，然后在课上认真听。

sentences.english: "Information Technique Lesson" Classroom Teaching and Lesson An Application;
sentences.chinese: 上好面授课，做好课前预习和课堂笔记。

sentences.english: We'll have a new lesson next time. please review it.
sentences.chinese: 我们明天讲新课，请大家预习一下。

definition: variant of 復習|复习[fu4 xi2]
(of a pupil) to write down (in a dictation exercise)/dictation/(music) to transcribe by ear
to attend a class/to go to a lecture
to go to class/to attend class/to go to teach a class
to take extra lessons in a cram school or with a private tutor
lesson plan/teaching plan/a "missionary case" (a dispute over Christian missionaries during the late Qing)
courseware (abbr. for 課程軟件|课程软件[ke4 cheng2 ruan3 jian4])
